title: Integrated Instructional Design of Online Learning Behaviors and Social Cognitive Motivation Characteristics: Preservice Teacher-Targeted Science Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science education principles and general familiarity with elementary curricula
context.additional_context: Supporting Pre-Service Teachers in Designing Effective Online Learning Strategies for Science Education and Understanding Learner Motivation Factors

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their motivational characteristics using measurement tools for social cognitive motivation (self-efficacy, task value perception, self-regulation)
Learners can design scientific inquiry activities in a VR simulation environment based on LXD (Learner Experience Design) principles
Learners can quantitatively evaluate learning engagement, elaboration, and critical thinking using peer feedback and dashboard data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
